resources.string:
version 1.0

 Tabs: ALBUMS, SONGS, and FAVORITES.


ALBUMS:
 You can see different albums and choose songs from them.


SONGS:
 List of your songs.


FAVORITES:
 List of added favorite songs.


For SETTINGS and CUSTOMIZATION:
 Click the menu button on the upper left corner or just simply swipe left the screen. 


DARK and LIGHT MODE:
 A message will pop up once it was successfully changed into desired theme.


SORT SONGS:
 You can select how you want to sort song by Title, Date, or Size


SLEEP MODE:
 You can set specific time of until when you want the song to be played.


VOICE ACTIVATION:
 Setting voice commands instead of clicking buttons.
